nodes.text: The Xappyh sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories. At least a portion of the sector was located in the Slice. Planets in Xappyh included Neelgaimon and Stic.
Jorus C'baoth served as ambassador-at-large to the sector.

Star Wars: Rebellion incorrectly places Thanta Zilbra, Thila, Ambria, G'rho, Norulac, and Tund in the Xappyh sector. Thanta Zilbra is in the Corellian sector; Ambria is in the Stenness Node; G'rho is on the Shiritoku Spur; Norulac is in the Inner Rim Territories; Thila is in the Gordian Reach; and Tund is in the Centrality.
